Comment: The Maroczy Bind – not the automatic win it was once thought to be, but a very tough formation to meet nonetheless.

?? Black must take the Bishop in order to exploit the dark squares with this move. This move order allows White to hang onto the Bishop for 6 crucial extra moves.
! The start of a decisive combination.
? Stubbornly hanging onto the a7-g1 diagonal. Cowering with …Qd8 was better, after which Bg5 saves the Bishop.

! After this calm sidestep, Black has nothing.

Black should really resign here, but plays on until just before mate. Note to readers: Please do not do this. Resigning a hopeless game is a simple matter of etiquette; some of us without premium memberships would like to play someone else and don't want to wait for two weeks.
